name: getNya
body:
Simple java application for downloading pictures from Zerochan.net.
You can find images by size or a tag.
It's simple. 
And flat.

All you need to do: download .jar file and run it with Oracle JVM (or any another JVM supporting image decoding).
Let's nya!

![getNyaScreen](https://pp.vk.me/c624124/v624124172/1facc/t0agTvW-1RY.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
